briefTitle: Trial Assessing Long Term USe of PCSK9 Inhibition in Subjects With Genetic LDL Disorders
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-label Study to Assess the Long-term Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy of Evolocumab (AMG145) on LDL-C in Subjects With Severe Familial Hypercholesterolemia
summary: A study to assess the long term safety and tolerability of evolocumab (AMG 145) in adolescents and adults with severe familial hypercholesterolemia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose of study drug in Study 20110271 up to 30 days after the last dose or until the end of study date, whichever was earlier; median duration of treatment was 48.7 months.
